item.title: Prince Andrew stripped of titles and must surrender lease to Windsor mansion
item.description: Prince Andrew is being stripped of his titles and must surrender his lease to Royal Lodge, according to a statement from Buckingham Palace.

item.title: The 2025 U.S government shutdown, by the numbers
item.description: The 2025 federal government shutdown, in the first year of Trump's second term, is one of the longest in U.S. history.

item.title: Mortgage rates are the lowest they've been since 2022. Here's how to get one even lower now.
item.description: Mortgage interest rates are the lowest they've been since 2022, but there are multiple ways to get one even lower.

item.title: Prince Andrew loses royal titles, Royal Lodge lease
item.description: Prince Andrew is being stripped of his royal titles and must move out of his mansion, Buckingham Palace announced on Thursday. Andrew has come under i...

item.title: At what age can you no longer buy life insurance? What seniors should know
item.description: You can typically buy life insurance well into your senior years, but your options and costs will change with age.
